item.title: How to make ms and admins
item.dc:creator: @Cyanide Cyanide
item.description:
@Cyanide wrote:

In client.java search “admin list” and you should see things like:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("username")) { playerRights = 3; }

Change the username to their in-game username, and their players rights to 1 for moderator, 2 for admin and 3 for owner.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make ms and admins
